rooms.description: Spacious living room with energy-efficient windows and proper ventilation, designed according to Vastu principles for enhancing positive energy. Placed in the east or northeast direction.
Modern eco-friendly kitchen with energy-saving appliances, natural lighting, and proper waste management system. Aligned on the south side for functional use while adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Small bathroom integrated near the kitchen for convenience with water-saving fixtures and proper ventilation.
Primary bedroom in the west section of the plot, ensuring privacy and tranquility while adhering to Vastu's emphasis on north-east orientation for health.
Secondary bedroom with eco-friendly insulation materials, designed as a guest room or workspace, ensuring proper natural light and ventilation.
Third bedroom placed in an area that maximizes energy efficiency with passive cooling designs.
Library positioned for quiet study and leisure reading, benefiting from natural light while maintaining privacy. Designed to be a multifunctional space with built-in shelves made of reclaimed wood.
Compact storage area integrated within the living spaces for sustainable use of space on a tight budget.

openings.description: Main entrance door ensuring proper alignment with Vastu principles, promoting positive energy flow while being weather resistant and aesthetically pleasing.
Window in the exit area to enhance ventilation and natural light, designed with low-emission glass.

external_spaces.description: Large garden integrated into the design, promoting sustainability through rainwater harvesting, green spaces, and local flora planting. The garden is positioned to maximize shade in the afternoon due to west-facing plot orientation.
